sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react" export const Home = ({ user }) => { const [studentWorksheets, setStudentWorksheets] = useState([]) const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState({}) const [userStudents, setUserStudents] = useState([]) const [userWorksheets, setUserWorksheets] = useState([]) const handleFetchCalls = () => { fetchUserStuden(user?.id).then((data) => { setUserStudents(data) }) fetchUserWorksheets(user?.id).then((data) => { setUserWorksheets(data) }) setUserInfo(user) fetchAllStudentWorksheets().then((data) => { const filterStudentWorksheets = data.filter((datum) => datum.isComplete === true && datum.isApproved !== true) setStudentWorksheets(filterStudentWorksheets) }) } useEffect(() => { handleFetchCalls() }, [user.id]) return (

Welcome {user.firstName}

{user?.aboutMe}

{userStudents?.length} students added
Click on the icon to see all students.
{userWorksheets?.length} worksheets added
Click on the icon to see all worksheets.
{studentWorksheets?.length} worksheets to review
Click on the icon to see all worksheets pending review.
) }
